channel.title: [PI/DSPK] Can't start the server? STILL NEED HELP REP++
channel.description:
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code] I've tried using jre7, jre6, jdk1.6.0, jdk1.6.0_25, jdk 1.7.0_02 and still get the same error (below).
Mind helping me with this error..?
I've disabled Norton's firewall and tried adding port 43594 through it but I still get this error.......
[code][12/28/11 4:20 PM]: Launching Cold Fusion... [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: java.io.IOExc eption: Unable to establish loopback connection [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(Unknown Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(Unknown Sour ce) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Unknown Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(Unknown Source)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Unkno wn Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Unknown Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:140) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: Caused by: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested a ddress: bind [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: ... 12 more Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
This is happening with all of my sources even regular PI (474), they where working perfectly fine like 2 days ago, WHAT'S WRONG??? I've also tried downgrading java's the redownloading/installing new ones but it still doesn't work.
I know people know how to fix this, it's just a matter of them deciding to take 10 minutes to help someone out.
Thanks in advance (not to any trolls).

item.title: [PI/DSPK] Can't start the server? STILL NEED HELP REP++
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
I’ve tried using jre7, jre6, jdk1.6.0, jdk1.6.0_25, jdk 1.7.0_02 and still get the same error (below).

Mind helping me with this error…?

I’ve disabled Norton’s firewall and tried adding port 43594 through it but I still get this error…

[code][12/28/11 4:20 PM]: Launching Cold Fusion…
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: Exception in thread “main” [12/28/11 4:20 PM]: java.io.IOExc
eption: Unable to establish loopback connection
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source)

thod)

[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(Unknown Sour
ce)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Unknown Source)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.(Unknown Source)

[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Unkno
wn Source)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Unknown Source)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s
tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b
ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:140)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: Caused by: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested a
ddress: bind
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source)

e)

[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source)
[12/28/11 4:20 PM]: … 12 more
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

This is happening with all of my sources even regular PI (474), they where working perfectly fine like 2 days ago, WHAT’S WRONG???
I’ve also tried downgrading java’s the redownloading/installing new ones but it still doesn’t work.

I know people know how to fix this, it’s just a matter of them deciding to take 10 minutes to help someone out.

Thanks in advance (not to any trolls).
